theorem putnam_1974_b5
: ∀ n ≥ 0, ∑ i ∈ Finset.Icc (0 : ℕ) n, (n^i : ℝ)/(Nat.factorial i) > (Real.exp n)/2 := by
  intro n hn
  have h₁ : ∑ i ∈ Finset.Icc (0 : ℕ) n, (n^i : ℝ)/(Nat.factorial i) > (Real.exp n)/2 := by
    have h₂ : ∑ i ∈ Finset.Icc (0 : ℕ) n, (n^i : ℝ)/(Nat.factorial i) = ∑ i ∈ Finset.Icc (0 : ℕ) n, (n^i : ℝ)/(Nat.factorial i) := rfl
    rw [h₂]
    have h₃ : ∑ i ∈ Finset.Icc (0 : ℕ) n, (n^i : ℝ)/(Nat.factorial i) ≥ ∑ i ∈ Finset.Icc (0 : ℕ) n, (n^i : ℝ)/(Nat.factorial i) := by rfl
    have h₄ : ∑ i ∈ Finset.Icc (0 : ℕ) n, (n^i : ℝ)/(Nat.factorial i) > (Real.exp n)/2 := by
      have h₅ : ∑ i ∈ Finset.Icc (0 : ℕ) n, (n^i : ℝ)/(Nat.factorial i) ≥ ∑ i ∈ Finset.Icc (0 : ℕ) 1, (n^i : ℝ)/(Nat.factorial i) := by
        apply Finset.sum_le_sum_of_subset_of_nonneg
        · intro x hx
          simp_all [Finset.mem_Icc]
          <;> omega
        · intro x _ hx
          positivity
      have h₆ : ∑ i ∈ Finset.Icc (0 : ℕ) 1, (n^i : ℝ)/(Nat.factorial i) ≥ (Real.exp n)/2 := by
        simp [Finset.sum_Icc_succ_top, Nat.factorial_succ, Nat.cast_add, Nat.cast_one, Nat.cast_mul, Real.exp_pos]
        have h₇ : n ≥ 0 := by linarith
        have h₈ : Real.exp n ≥ 0 := Real.exp_pos n |>.le
        have h₉ : (n : ℝ) ^ 0 = 1 := by norm_num
        have h₁₀ : (Nat.factorial 0 : ℝ) = 1 := by norm_num

        <;>
        nlinarith [Real.add_one_le_exp n, sq_nonneg (n - 1)]
      linarith
    exact h₄
  exact h₁

theorem putnam_1974_b5
: ∀ n ≥ 0, ∑ i ∈ Finset.Icc (0 : ℕ) n, (n^i : ℝ)/(Nat.factorial i) > (Real.exp n)/2 := by
  intro n hn
  have h₁ : ∑ i ∈ Finset.Icc (0 : ℕ) n, (n^i : ℝ)/(Nat.factorial i) = ∑ i ∈ Finset.Icc (0 : ℕ) n, (n^i : ℝ)/(Nat.factorial i) := rfl
  rw [h₁]
  have h₂ : ∑ i ∈ Finset.Icc (0 : ℕ) n, (n^i : ℝ)/(Nat.factorial i) > (Real.exp n)/2 := by
    have h₃ : ∑ i ∈ Finset.Icc (0 : ℕ) n, (n^i : ℝ)/(Nat.factorial i) = ∑ i ∈ Finset.range (n + 1), (n^i : ℝ)/(Nat.factorial i) := by

      have h₆ : ∑ i ∈ Finset.range (n + 1), (n^i : ℝ)/(Nat.factorial i) = Real.exp n := by

    exact h₅
  exact h₂
